pitch.cc: A.J. Burnett may be running out of gas after 72 pitches; his fastball has dropped from a high of 94 to as low as 90.
That was pitch number 75 for A.J. Burnett; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .244 average in the first 75 pitches but they hit .314 off him after that.
